about_the_game:
Guardians, an extraordinary action role-playing game that transports you to a captivating universe teeming with danger, discovery, and heroism. Immerse yourself in a sprawling, post-apocalyptic world where chaos-infected creatures roam, and the fate of civilization rests on your shoulders.

As a guardian mecha droid, you embody the last line of defense against the encroaching darkness. Prepare to unleash your unique powers, wield formidable weapons, and master devastating abilities as you embark on an epic quest to restore balance and vanquish the forces of chaos.

EXPLORE DIFFERENT MAPS
Prepare to test your courage, skill, and determination as you embrace your destiny in Guardians. The fate of humanity hangs in the balance, and it's up to you to become the legendary hero the world desperately needs. Are you ready to unleash your power and shine as a Guardian? The future awaits. Get experience of fighting on many different planets.



FIGHT FOR HUMANITY
Explore a sprawling, post-apocalyptic world filled with breathtaking landscapes, from lush forests to haunting ruins. Each planet holds unique ecosystems, hidden secrets, and treacherous challenges, offering endless possibilities for discovery and adventure.



MULTIPLAYER
Team up with your friends and fight against chaos enemies. Unity will be stronger. But are you also ready to compete against other players? Enjoy playing both multiplayer and co-op.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600, 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements might change in the future
